* Zyber watches as DeathScythe walks over to him, seeing that he was limping 
a bit. But she took up another fistfull of snow.*

" You should put some snow on it, it can take down swelling and relieve the 
pai..."

* She was sent sprawling into the snow from the impact of DeathScythes fist 
smashing into her face, whimpering a bit as she slowly sat up.
She gently fingered the red welt which was starting to develop on her white 
cheek.*

" I was just trying to help."
